webpages.name: Personal Site - Landing Page
webpages.description: This is the landing page of my personal site. It was my initiation into jekyll and Github Pages and was built using JQuery and Bootstrap4 amongst other things.

webpages.name: Personal Site - About-Me Page
webpages.description: This page serves to help people learn a litlte bit more about me (friends and perspective employers alike). It also helped me further explore the functionality of ghpages and jekyll.

webpages.name: Personal Site - Portfolio Page
webpages.description: This webpage not only serves to feature my work, but is a work in and of itself. It introduced me to npm as a package manager, webpack as a module bundler, and showed me how to use React with ghpages/jekyll. It really is my pride and joy. I hope your enjoying it!

codepens.name: FCC Leaderboard
codepens.description: This codepen features a FreeCodeCamp Leaderboard. It was my initial step into making ajax calls with React. It taught me several 'gotcha's', such as the fact that setState function may or may not be async.

codepens.name: Github Flavored Markdown
codepens.description: This codepen was my first introduction into React. Features github flavored markdown. Pretty straight forward.

codepens.name: Simon Game
codepens.description: This was my graduation project from Frontend development (as far as FreeCodeCamp goes any way. It was fun designing, but I'm much of a simon says kind of guy. But feel free to test it out. Try win by getting to 20!

codepens.name: TicTacToe Game
codepens.description: A simple game of tictactoe against an AI that refuses to lose. Like really it can't lose. This was really fun to build as it introduced me to the minimax algorithm (which made me feel much smarter than I really am). Test it out!

codepens.name: Twitch Api
codepens.description: A twitch api which introduced me to ajax calls oh so long ago. Seems like forever since I built this, but I still like the design quality. Don't you?
